attributes.action: Suspend all Remain MPs until Brexit is delivered
attributes.additional_details: Backbenchers having amendments pushed through in hour. Yvette cooper
attributes.background:
The people voted to leave. All the remain MPs are doing all they can to stop brexit
The speaker should be impartial where he proves he is a staunch remainer

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
